metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4434 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
fwknop before 2.0.3 allow remote authenticated users to cause a denial ofservice (server crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4434` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fwknop-client - 2.0.3-2ubuntu1
fwknop-server - 2.0.3-2ubuntu1
libfko-perl - 2.0.3-2ubuntu1
libfko1 - 2.0.3-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fwknop package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.3-2ubuntu1').
